org.jamwiki

Interface JAMWikiParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlikiParser, org.jamwiki.parser.jflex.JFlexParser

    public interface JAMWikiParser
    Interface to be used when implementing new parsers. New parsers should implement this interface and override any methods that need to be implemented differently.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String buildRedirectContent(String topicName)
      Return a parser-specific value that can be used as the content of a topic representing a redirect.

      Parse an edit comment and return HTML for online representation.
      String parseFragment(ParserInput parserInput, ParserOutput parserOutput, String raw, int mode)
      This method parses content, performing all transformations except for layout changes such as adding paragraph tags.
      String parseHTML(ParserInput parserInput, ParserOutput parserOutput, String raw)
      Returns a HTML representation of the given wiki raw text for online representation.
      void parseMetadata(ParserInput parserInput, ParserOutput parserOutput, String raw)
      This method provides a way to parse content and set all output metadata, such as link values used by the search engine.
      String parseMinimal(ParserInput parserInput, String raw)
      Perform a bare minimum of parsing as required prior to saving a topic to the database.

      When making a section edit this function provides the capability to retrieve all text within a specific heading level.
      String parseSplice(ParserInput parserInput, ParserOutput parserOutput, String raw, int targetSection, String replacementText)
      This method provides the capability for re-integrating a section edit back into the main topic.

    • Method Detail

      • buildRedirectContent

        String buildRedirectContent(String topicName)
        Return a parser-specific value that can be used as the content of a topic representing a redirect. For the Mediawiki syntax parser the value returned would be of the form "#REDIRECT [[Topic]]".
        Parameters:
        topicName - The name of the topic to redirect to.
        Returns:
        A parser-specific value that can be used as the content of a topic representing a redirect.

      • parseEditComment

        String parseEditComment(ParserInput parserInput,
                        ParserOutput parserOutput,
                        String raw)
                 throws ParserException
        Parse an edit comment and return HTML for online representation.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - Input configuration settings.
        parserOutput - A ParserOutput object containing parser metadata output.
        raw - The raw Wiki syntax to be converted into HTML.
        Returns:
        The parsed content.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if any error occurs during parsing.

      • parseFragment

        String parseFragment(ParserInput parserInput,
                     ParserOutput parserOutput,
                     String raw,
                     int mode)
              throws ParserException
        This method parses content, performing all transformations except for layout changes such as adding paragraph tags. It is suitable to be used when parsing the contents of a link or performing similar internal manipulation.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - Input configuration settings.
        parserOutput - A ParserOutput object containing parser metadata output.
        raw - The raw Wiki syntax to be converted into HTML.
        mode - The parser mode to use when parsing. Mode affects what type of parsing actions are taken when processing raw text.
        Returns:
        The parsed content.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if any error occurs during parsing.

      • parseHTML

        String parseHTML(ParserInput parserInput,
                 ParserOutput parserOutput,
                 String raw)
          throws ParserException
        Returns a HTML representation of the given wiki raw text for online representation.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - Input configuration settings.
        parserOutput - A ParserOutput object containing parser metadata output.
        raw - The raw Wiki syntax to be converted into HTML.
        Returns:
        The parsed content.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if any error occurs during parsing.

      • parseMetadata

        void parseMetadata(ParserInput parserInput,
                   ParserOutput parserOutput,
                   String raw)
            throws ParserException
        This method provides a way to parse content and set all output metadata, such as link values used by the search engine.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - Input configuration settings.
        parserOutput - A ParserOutput object containing parser metadata output.
        raw - The raw Wiki syntax to be converted into HTML.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if any error occurs during parsing.

      • parseMinimal

        String parseMinimal(ParserInput parserInput,
                    String raw)
             throws ParserException
        Perform a bare minimum of parsing as required prior to saving a topic to the database. In general this method will simply parse signature tags are return.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - Input configuration settings.
        raw - The raw Wiki syntax to be converted into HTML.
        Returns:
        The parsed content.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if any error occurs during parsing.

      • parseSlice

        String parseSlice(ParserInput parserInput,
                  ParserOutput parserOutput,
                  String raw,
                  int targetSection)
           throws ParserException
        When making a section edit this function provides the capability to retrieve all text within a specific heading level. For example, if targetSection is specified as five, and the sixth heading is an <h2>, then this method will return the heading tag and all text up to either the next <h2>, <h1>, or the end of the document, whichever comes first.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - Input configuration settings.
        parserOutput - A ParserOutput object containing parser metadata output.
        raw - The raw Wiki text that is to be parsed.
        targetSection - The section (counted from zero) that is to be returned.
        Returns:
        Returns the raw topic content for the target section.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if any error occurs during parsing.

      • parseSplice

        String parseSplice(ParserInput parserInput,
                   ParserOutput parserOutput,
                   String raw,
                   int targetSection,
                   String replacementText)
            throws ParserException
        This method provides the capability for re-integrating a section edit back into the main topic. The text to be re-integrated is provided along with the full Wiki text and a targetSection. All of the content of targetSection is then replaced with the new text.
        Parameters:
        parserInput - Input configuration settings.
        parserOutput - A ParserOutput object containing parser metadata output.
        raw - The raw Wiki text that is to be parsed.
        targetSection - The section (counted from zero) that is to be returned.
        replacementText - The text to replace the target section text with.
        Returns:
        The raw topic content including the new replacement text.
        Throws:
        ParserException - Thrown if any error occurs during parsing.
